data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Hopkins Marine Station, California, USA (HMS001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Hopkins Marine Station, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway XTI Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2000-06-18. The instrument depth was 018 meters, in an overall water depth of 020 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
